description: Open standard for portable worldbuilding data with 22 element types, YAML schemas, and RESTful API
rules: YAML schemas in /schema are the source of truth - do not edit generated files in /languages
All elements inherit base_properties.yaml: id (UUIDv7), name (required), description, world (required), image_url, supertype, subtype
Run yaml_to_* scripts after schema changes to regenerate language bindings
22 element types available - see /schema for complete list with fields and relationships
Fields can be: string, text, integer, single_link (one element), multi_link (many elements)
Authentication: API-Key and API-Pin headers (get from onlyworlds.com profile)
Use name__icontains for search, world={uuid} to filter by world
Map/Pin/Marker are elements for spatial data; World is the container table
Check onlyworlds_complete_schema.yaml for consolidated schema reference
